text: Otto Knerr (January 16, 1883 - March 31, 1960) was an American gymnast. He competed in three events at the 1904 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1883 births Category:1960 deaths Category:American male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of the United States Category:Gymnasts at the 1904 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Illinois
title: Otto Knerr
